title: When is best time to get flu shot? Analysis compares scenarios

title_detail.value: When is best time to get flu shot? Analysis compares scenarios

summary: When flu season peaks after mid-winter, tens of thousands of influenza cases and hundreds of deaths can likely be avoided if older adults wait until October to get their flu immunization.

summary_detail.value: When flu season peaks after mid-winter, tens of thousands of influenza cases and hundreds of deaths can likely be avoided if older adults wait until October to get their flu immunization.
